details:
It was discovered that there was a heap buffer overflow vulnerability
in curl, the library and command-line tool for transferring data over the
internet.


* [CVE-2019-5482](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-5482)
TFTP small blocksize heap buffer overflow


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
7.38.0-4+deb8u16.


We recommend that you upgrade your curl packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
